issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. If I disable AdGuard, close the browsers, then restart, the unsubscribe button is visible again. I did update filters. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/cq7zhgkoi08o4skkkgwcg8ggock0socbliaty4vxnk.jpg?nc=1)

Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880),
Hide your Referrer from third-parties Filters: | Ad Blocking:

issue.title: instagram.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.2.168

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.instagram.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

To reproduce: Turn on the video player audio and pay attention to the audio, between posts like in the video. Missed ads (Audio) or incorrect blocking (Posts)

<details><summary>Video</summary>

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/56846906/7fb9095f-2a79-4461-971e-a8756e723545

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: I can't access to my account now.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.hyponamiru.cz/en/mortgages/mortgage-calculator](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hyponamiru.cz%2Fen%2Fmortgages%2Fmortgage-calculator) ### Comment Username: @grmelacz > How to replicate: > 1. Have AdGuard enabled in Safari. > 2. Try to submit a verification code for mortgage calculation. > > What happens (problem description): > 1. Nothing happens, the verification window closes and an error appears in the console. > > What should happen: > 1. You are redirected to continue the process to moje.hyponamiru.cz. > > The exact same problem occurs in mobile Safari with AdGuard extension. Does not happen in Brave with AdGuard extension. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/s4suvs9phw0cokcwo044g8s0ssgowks9uqrwta847o.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
@zloyden It is caused by the Tracking Protection filter. When I disable that filter, the page works just fine.

On top of that, I've figured out the error `Uncaught (in promise): [object Undefined]` is shown in console right after the page loads, no need to submit anything.

comment.body:
To disable the automatically closing cookie notice rule, you can add this rule:
```adblock
consent.tyla.com#@%#//scriptlet('trusted-click-element', '.message-component > button[title="Accept 🍪"]')
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
@crittersfritters 
It the problem still exists, please record a HAR file of the page and send it + link of this issue it to `filters@adguard.com`
How to get a HAR file:
https://toolbox.googleapps.com/apps/har_analyzer/
Open dev tools **before** you open the site.
